labelGroup.title: Label group
labelGroup.description: Select which collection of labels is going to be used in the task; List of all label group can be found on the image service UI

tags.title: Image tag
tags.description: Use only images with these tags only, image has to contain all the tags (logical AND)

owners.title: Image owners
owners.description: Use only images from specified owners. Conjunction of images owned by one of the owners (logical OR)
